clips.image_prompt:
GeneralDescription: "Medium shot of John’s wry expression as he floats in zero gravity, helmet reflecting starlight. The camera captures the camaraderie and humor between the two astronauts."
            LocationDescription: |
            Medium shot of John’s wry expression as he floats in zero gravity, helmet reflecting starlight. The camera captures the camaraderie and humor between the two astronauts. 
            John and Rock drift side by side in open space, the Earth and their spinning spaceship forming a luminous backdrop. Their humorous banter lightens the tension as they contemplate their predicament.
            Characters:
            Name: "John"
Attributes: "Male, 32 years old, Caucasian, average build, average, average, fair skin, short brown straight neatly trimmed hair, blue almond eyes, medium, straight eyebrows, straight nose, medium lips, clean_shaven, wearing white white NASA spacesuit (fitted fit, long sleeves, crew (spacesuit collar) neck), white white NASA spacesuit pants (fitted fit, full length), white spacesuit helmet (formal (astronaut helmet)), white white astronaut boots (formal (spacesuit boots)), white astronaut helmet, wry, smirking, NASA mission patches, utility belt, professional style, clean, technical, professional aesthetic"

Name: "Rock"
Attributes: "Male, 42 years old, Caucasian, athletic build, tall, average, light tan skin, short dark blonde wavy slightly tousled hair, green round eyes, thick, arched eyebrows, broad nose, full lips, dark blonde stubble (light stubble), wearing white white NASA spacesuit (fitted fit, long sleeves, crew (spacesuit collar) neck), white white NASA spacesuit pants (fitted fit, full length), white spacesuit helmet (formal (astronaut helmet)), white white astronaut boots (formal (spacesuit boots)), white astronaut helmet, dramatic, grinning, NASA mission patches, utility belt, professional style, bold, technical, professional aesthetic"

            CameraAngle: "medium shot"
            DIALOGUE: (tilting head, smirking) Rock, I think we’re a bit off course. by JOHN
DIALOGUE: (flailing arms dramatically) A bit? We’ve spun into the cosmic washing machine! by ROCK
DIALOGUE: (chuckling) Well, at least we’re on the rinse cycle. by JOHN
DIALOGUE: (grinning, looking at Earth) Think we’ll get a spin dry? by ROCK
DIALOGUE: (softly) Let’s hope we get back in time for laundry day. by JOHN

In the style of Ghibli anime
